author: Special Correspondent
text:
The third edition of MVS Cycling Carnival in association with the Tamil Nadu Cycling Association will be conducted on February 6, and 7 at the Kari Motor Speedway, and Chettipalayam. An off-road racing facility, Enduro, too has been introduced.

There are several categories under which the participants can register. The cash awards for the first three places are Rs. 10,000, Rs. 6,000, Rs. 4,000.

Jaymin Shah, country manager, Scott sports, says: “60 per cent of participants will be from outside the State. Those from Imphal, Pune, and New Delhi have registered.”

Arjun Balu, director of the event says: “One more day has been added this time. All facilities for medical emergencies have been arranged.” Registrations can be done at MVS Enterprises, and Tissot, Coimbatore.

For online registration, visitwww.mvs coimbatorecriterium.com. Registration will close on January 31.

For registration details, contact Deepak (Ph: 9884409181) and for race day queries, Prakash (Ph: 9843131000).
title: Cycling carnival on February 6
